name: Burger
description: Tasty beef burger with cheese and lettuce.
descriptionLong: This juicy grilled beef burger is made with seasoned ground beef, melted cheese, and crispy lettuce on a toasted bun.

name: Pizza
description: Cheesy pepperoni pizza with fresh herbs.
descriptionLong: Classic pizza loaded with mozzarella, pepperoni, and tomato-herb sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Salad
description: Healthy fresh salad with tomatoes and cucumbers.
descriptionLong: A refreshing mix of lettuce, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and vinaigrette.

name: Jollof Rice
description: West African spicy rice with vegetables.
descriptionLong: Tomato-based rice dish cooked with peppers, onions, and spices, served with chicken.

name: Fufu and Egusi Soup
description: Traditional Nigerian fufu served with melon seed soup.
descriptionLong: Soft fufu paired with rich egusi soup made with ground melon seeds, spinach, and meats.

name: Suya Skewers
description: Grilled spicy beef skewers from West Africa.
descriptionLong: Tender beef marinated in spices and roasted over open flame, served with onions.

name: Injera with Stew
description: Ethiopian injera flatbread with spicy lentil stew.
descriptionLong: Sourdough flatbread served with lentils simmered in berbere spice blend.

name: Bobotie
description: South African curried meatloaf with egg topping.
descriptionLong: Spiced minced beef baked with an egg custard topping, served with yellow rice.
